overview: Both hardcore fans and newbies alike get the unique opportunity to experience Nazareth performing their hit songs live in an intimate setting. This concert is paired with a tribute to the band,featuring never before seen footage and an interview with Dan McCafferty, as he passes the baton to a new lead singer. FEATURING: Dan McCafferty, Manny Charlton, Pete Agnew and Darrel Sweet
title: Nazareth.Live.at.Metropolis.Studios
